name: Four Horsemen (itch) (smcintyre)
description:
Who knew you needed a date for the apocalypse?

You're a disillusioned twenty-something who's fed up with the state of the world. Your solution? End it. The whole dang thing. All from the comfort of your living room.

A small first foray into the world of visual novels by Staci McIntyre, author of ubothsuck(dot)com and Loneliest Princess.
